alert.note: Alert for Big Island Interior; Big Island North; Big Island South; Big Island Southeast; Kahoolawe; Kohala; Lanai Leeward; Lanai Mauka; Lanai Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Central Valley South; Maui Leeward West; South Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued July 15 at 3:28PM HST until July 16 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...Wind advisory in effect from 6am to 6pm Saturday for portions of Maui County and the Big Island... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with localized gusts around 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of the Big Island, Maui, Lanai, and Kahoolawe. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to steer, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
